Scripts.OnClick:
local centerDisplay = self:GetParent() local suggestionFrame = centerDisplay:GetParent()
if suggestionFrame:GetID() == 2 then HardcoreFrame:SetTopTab(2) elseif suggestionFrame:GetID() == 3 then HardcoreFrame:SetTopTab(4) end

Scripts.OnHyperlinkEnter: local linkType, linkFeatureIndex, isFeature1 = string.split(":", link, 3) linkFeatureIndex = tonumber(linkFeatureIndex) if linkType == "desc" and linkFeatureIndex then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_CURSOR_RIGHT", 10, 10) GameTooltip:SetText(text, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) if isFeature1 == "custom" then GameTooltip:AddLine(C_Hardcore.GetFeatureCustomDescription(linkFeatureIndex), 1, 1, 1, 1) elseif isFeature1 == "1" then GameTooltip:AddLine(C_Hardcore.GetFeature1Description(linkFeatureIndex), 1, 1, 1, 1) else GameTooltip:AddLine(C_Hardcore.GetFeatureDescription(linkFeatureIndex), 1, 1, 1, 1) end GameTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnHyperlinkClick: local linkType = string.split(":", link) if linkType == "kbase" then RunNextFrame(function() -- workaround block of SimpleHTML widget text change when hyperlink is clicked SetItemRef(link, text, button, self) end) end

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.disabledReason then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip_SetTitle(GameTooltip, HARDCORE_CHALLENGES_DISABLE_REASON_UNAVAILABLE, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR) GameTooltip_AddHighlightLine(GameTooltip, _G[string.format("HARDCORE_CHALLENGES_DISABLE_REASON_%d_DESCRIPTION", self.disabledReason)]) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.CornerTopLeft:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-CornerTopLeft", true) self.CornerBottomLeft:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-CornerBottomLeft", true) self.EdgeLeft:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-EdgeLeft", true) self.CornerTopRight:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-CornerTopRight", true) self.CornerBottomRight:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-CornerBottomRight", true) self.EdgeRight:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-EdgeRight", true) self.EdgeTop:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-EdgeTop", true) self.EdgeBottom:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-EdgeBottom", true)
self.BridgeTop:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-Bridge-Top", true) self.BridgeBottom:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-Bridge-Bottom", true) self.BridgeVertical:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-Bridge-Vertical", true) self.TabLeft:SetAtlas("Custom-Challenges-Border-MiddleTabButton-Left", true)

Scripts.OnHyperlinkClick: local linkType = string.split(":", link) if linkType == "kbase" then RunNextFrame(function() -- workaround block of SimpleHTML widget text change when hyperlink is clicked SetItemRef(link, text, button, self) end) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") if self:IsEnabled() == 1 then GameTooltip_SetTitle(GameTooltip, DEATH_RECAP_TITLE_DONT_INFO, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR) else GameTooltip_SetTitle(GameTooltip, DEATH_RECAP_UNAVAILABLE, RED_FONT_COLOR) end GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad: local banner = self:GetParent() self.FlashBurst:ClearAllPoints() self.FlashBurst:SetPoint("CENTER", banner.SkullSpikes, 15, -4) self.FlashBurstLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.FlashBurstLeft:SetPoint("CENTER", banner.SkullSpikes, -15, -4) self.FlashBurstCenter:ClearAllPoints() self.FlashBurstCenter:SetPoint("CENTER", banner.SkullSpikes, 0, 0) self.RedFlash:ClearAllPoints() self.RedFlash:SetPoint("CENTER", banner.SkullSpikes, 1, -4)
